client.join

Interface INewGameView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IOverlayView, IView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NewGameView

    public interface INewGameView
extends IOverlayView
    Interface for the new game view, which lets the user enter parameters for a new game
